6// ContextImpl:
7// Implementation-specific functionality associated with a GL Context.
8//
9
10#include "libANGLE/renderer/ContextImpl.h"
11
12#include "libANGLE/Context.h"
13
14namespace rx
15{
16ContextImpl::ContextImpl(const gl::State &state, gl::ErrorSet *errorSet)
17 : mState(state), mMemoryProgramCache(nullptr), mErrors(errorSet)
18{}
19
20ContextImpl::~ContextImpl() {}
21
22void ContextImpl::invalidateTexture(gl::TextureType target)
23{
24 UNREACHABLE();
25}
26
27angle::Result ContextImpl::onUnMakeCurrent(const gl::Context *context)
28{
29 return angle::Result::Continue;
30}
31
32void ContextImpl::setMemoryProgramCache(gl::MemoryProgramCache *memoryProgramCache)
33{
34 mMemoryProgramCache = memoryProgramCache;
35}
36
37void ContextImpl::handleError(GLenum errorCode,
38 const char *message,
39 const char *file,
40 const char *function,
41 unsigned int line)
42{
43 std::stringstream errorStream;
44 errorStream << "Internal error: " << gl::FmtHex(errorCode) << ": " << message;
45 mErrors->handleError(errorCode, errorStream.str().c_str(), file, function, line);
46}
47
48egl::ContextPriority ContextImpl::getContextPriority() const
49{
50 return egl::ContextPriority::Medium;
51}
52
53egl::Error ContextImpl::releaseHighPowerGPU(gl::Context *)
54{
55 return egl::NoError();
56}
57
58egl::Error ContextImpl::reacquireHighPowerGPU(gl::Context *)
59{
60 return egl::NoError();
61}
62
63} // namespace rx
64
